activities:
The personal information received by Electronic Arts from the EU includes personal data that Electronic Arts processes as a data controller. Personal information that is gathered through the means listed in the Electronic Arts Online Privacy Policy may be used to communicate with users, generally, including to alert consumers to new products, features and enhancements; special offers; upgrade opportunities; and contests and events of interest; conduct surveys; provide services and/or products requested and personalize their experience. Personal information may also be used for technical support, facilitate sales transactions, direct appropriate advertising, and internal analysis. Personal information may also be shared with Electronic Arts' third party partners, provided the consumer has opted into the sharing of such information at the time information is gathered or at a subsequent time. 
Electronic Arts will use and transfer personal information gathered from employees and job applicants for employment and business related purposes such as assess ability for available positions, payroll, benefits, expenses, managing operating plans, meeting governmental reporting requirements, security, health and safety management, performance management and assessment, company network access, and authentication and, as needed, to facilitate any investigation or disciplinary action, or in any civil or criminal legal proceeding or where otherwise necessary to comply with a legal obligation of the company. Electronic Arts will retain personal information processed on behalf of its users and employees for as long as needed to provide services to its users and employees or as required by law.
